name: Howdy Stranger
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Theme: Lost & Found

You wake up in a strange place...

Press space to lock the mouse cursor.

A,W,S,D for movement.

Howdy Stranger is a game about a lost soul stuck in limbo.

A questionable figure offers you passage to elsewhere for a simple price: a card.

Trade your card with shadowy figures at an otherworldly train station and secure a train ticket for your passage.

This game uses a prototyped reactionary dialogue system that changes interactions based on the card you are holding.

Also,  the game is designed to change based on the number of times it is successfully completed. Currently the only change is the welcome dialogue.
